noun.description: What is meant by a word, text, concept, or action.
examples: it was as if time had lost all meaning

adjective.description: Intended to communicate something that is not directly expressed.
examples: she gave Gabriel a meaning look

phrases: “Humanity?” You don't know the meaning of the word!
These people don't know the meaning of the word defeat.
Rudy tells the story of a boy who doesn't know the meaning of the word quit.
You don't know the meaning of the word, he told her as he dragged her toward the car, but you're going to learn.
I'm sorry, Hannah, he doesn't know the meaning of the word.
origin: Late Middle English: verbal noun from mean.
